meta_description: The Sandwich Glass Museum is a contemporary studio glass art gallery and town history museum in Sandwich MA with frequently rotating special exhibits and an extensive permanent collection of Sandwich Glass. Sandwich Glass was famously produced in the 19th Century by the Boston & Sandwich Glass Factory, starting in 1825
hours_text:
##  Hours & Admission 

Through Dec 30th we are open daily from 9:30 - 5, except for Thanksgiving and Christmas. Admission closes at 4:30.

Adult admission to the Museum's galleries and to see a glassblowing demonstration is $15. See [Plan Your Visit](/pages/plan-your-visit "Plan Your Visit") for the full schedule of admission fees as well as other helpful info regarding accessibility, parking, seasonal hours, etc.

Visiting the Gift Shop is free and open to the public with no admission fee. 

[ Plan Your Visit ](/pages/plan-your-visit)

collections_text:
Feb 1 - March 29 2026 

##  Dodge Macknight: A Life in Color 

Step into the colorful world of Dodge Macknight (1860â€“1950), the prominent artist who made Cape Cod his home.

[ Learn More ](https://sandwichglassmuseum.org/pages/dodge-macknight)

##  Visit 

Since 1925 the Sandwich Glass Museum has been interpreting the glassmaking history of the Town of Sandwich, and since 1980 we have been actively fostering contemporary glass art and the artists who make it.

Our theme for 2025, the bi-centennial of glassmaking in Sandwich, is "Illuminating the Past, Sparking the Future"

[ Learn More ](/pages/illuminating-the-past-sparking-the-future)

##  Support 

As a non-profit Historical Society and Museum, we rely heavily on the generous support of our community. 

Discover how you can get involved in keeping our mission going!

[ Get Involved ](/pages/support)

##  Learn 

As part of our 2025 "Illuminating the Past, Sparking the Future" bicentennial celebration, we are extending and adding to our educational offerings. 

From Glass Fusing and our ever popular Glass Experience to the Kids Discover Glass Room, come learn with, and about, us!

[ Learn More ](/pages/learn)

##  Research 

Are you conducting research on Sandwich Town history or specifcally on Sandwich Glass? Our permanent collections are searchable online! 

[ Search our Online Collection ](https://www.sandwichhistoricalsociety.org/research)
